divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog when I looked at the sky and saw a bright fireball with a tail falling to earth. I assume. It was pink, yellow, and orange. My dog and I ran all the way home, and I told my husband, and I called a friend, and even emailed a sort of expert. I did not realize I could report it on here till now. It was falling towards New Hampshire. I live in Maine. My husband and I watched it fade out of sight. Likely a meteor, but it was pretty big looking. I never found any reports on it.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bridgton
There were no other sightings in Bridgton on or around November 16th 2013
